title: What are the Realme 7i specifications? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dimensions -164.1 x 75.5 x 8.9 mm (6.46 x 2.97 x 0.35 in) Weight - 188 g (6.63 oz) Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by) DISPLAY - IPS LCD, 90Hz ,6.5 inches, 102.0 cm Resolutions - 720 x 1600 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~270 ppi density) OS - Android 10, Realme UI Chipset - Qualcomm SM6115 Snapdragon 662 (11 nm) CPU - Octa-core (4x2.0 GHz Kryo 260 Gold & 4x1.8 GHz Kryo 260 Silver) GPU - Adreno 610 Internal - 128GB 8GB RAM Primary Camera 64 MP, f/1.8, 26mm (wide), 1/1.73", 0.8µm, PDAF8 MP, f/2.3, 119˚, 16mm (ultrawide), 1/4.0", 1.12µm2 MP, f/2.4, (macro)2 MP, f/2.4, (depth) LED flash, HDR, panorama Video 1080p@30fps, gyro-EIS Front Camera 16 MP, f/2.1, 26mm (wide), 1/3", 1.0µm HDR 1080p@30fps, gyro-EIS 3.5 mm jack Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot 5.0, A2DP, LE Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS, BDS USB Type-C 2.0, USB On-The-Go FEATURES Li-Po 5000 mAh, non-removable Fast charging 18W Aurora Green, Polar Blue RMX2103 Price - 11999/12999 Hope it helps. Thank You

The Realme 7i smartphone will be launched in India on October 7, 2020. Realme 7i is an upgraded version of Realme 6i. The phone comes in two colors, a fusion green and a fusion blue. RealMe's phone has four cameras and is powered by a Snapdragon 662 octa-core processor. The phone will go on sale on October 16 at the Flipkart, offline store and http://realme.com. The starting price of the Realme 7i is 11,999. Below are some features of Realme 7i listed. Realme 7i Full Specifications - Technical Army
